text: Hi how are you doing?
Hello I am well, how are you doing?
I am good, wasting away my saturday doing surveys.
You and me both, trying to hit my number so I can do something else
Number?  Do you set a quota for yourself?
Yeah, I try to do 15-20 dollars a day. Need the extra income
Oh, that's a good idea.  How long does it usually take you?
2 to 3 hours usually depends. weekends are always slower
I'm noticing that.  I just started, this is my third day.  How long for you?
about 4 months. I would try to perform this task with the 10 questions if you would like to get this bonus.
Yep.  I did this one earlier.  I was on the other side though.  I take it you\'ve done it before?  So you do you know about "Save the Children?"
No, I\'m not sure what exactly is "Save the Children"?
It's a great charity which helps children in developing countries.  They will give you the opportunity to donate a portion of your earnings at the end of this HIT.
Wow that sounds really interesting. What do these children need help with?
A wide variety of things.  Often food or medical attention.  Have you had the opportunity to travel to a developing country?
No. I have not. How would my money go about reaching these children?
Save the Children is a worldwide organization, so once the receive the donation it will go into their efforts to assist children.
Ok that sounds excellent. How do I donate from here?
You will see a donation screen pop up at the end of the HIT and you will have the opportunity to provide a donation from your HIT earnings.
Ok, and how much would I be able to Donate from this HIT>
You can give up to the $2 bonus they offer.
Ok that sounds excellent. What do you think is the normal donation to give?
Anything helps, but a dollar would be excellent.
